game.name: Super Blackjack Battle 2 Turbo Edition - The Card Warriors
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 라스베이거스에서 가장 큰 카지노 주인과 가장 강력한 지역 범죄 조직 대부의 초대로 모인 12명의 캐릭터가 서로를 마주하고 카드 게임을 벌입니다. 최고의 플레이어만이 라스베이거스로 날아가 범죄의 대부와 마지막 결전을 벌일 수 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Follow the invitation by the owner of the largest Casino in Las Vegas and Godfather of the local most influential crime family and face the other participants in a face-off game of cards. Only the best will fly to Vegas to challenge the Godfather himself in a final match!

reviewHighlights.text: Super Blackjack Battle 2 Turbo Edition - The Card Warriors is an eccentric, style-forward reinterpretation of classic blackjack developed and publishe...
I think paid $0.71 and still asked for a refund.
